testsuite.name: users.UsersCityFieldTest
testsuite.system-out: Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersCityPlaceholderText Testcase execution Started "This method verifies City field Placeholder text in the Users Add screen" City* text is displayed in the City placeholder TC_usersCityPlaceholderText Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersCitySpace Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Users Add screen City field by entering Spaces" Entered space in the Users screen City text field Space is not allowed error message is displayed TC_usersCitySpace Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersTestWaitsSpecialChar Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Users Add screen City field for the Special characters" Performed click action on Users screen City field Entered text "-'*-(" in the Users screen City field Special characters are allowed in the City text field TC_usersTestWaitsSpecialChar Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersCityMaximumLength Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Users Add screen City field for the maximum character length" Performed click action on Users screen City field Entered text "YDAFYxOHHBcLUJfNKRnuJRkSyINxwqx" in the Users screen City field Must not exceed 30 characters error message is displayed TC_usersCityMaximumLength Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersCityEmpty Testcase execution Started "This method verifies error message for the empty City in the Users Add screen" Performed click action on Users screen City field Entered text "" in the Users screen City field Required error message is displayed TC_usersCityEmpty Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersCityMinimumLength Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Users Add screen City field for the minimum character length" Performed click action on Users screen City field Entered text "O" in the Users screen City field Must be greater than 1 character error message is displayed TC_usersCityMinimumLength Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersCityAlphanumeric Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Users Add screen City field for the Alphabetic characters" Performed click action on Users screen City field Entered text "zuA" in the Users screen City field Alphanumeric characters are allowed in the City text field TC_usersCityAlphanumeric Testcase execution Completed
